website_summaries.verdict: This active R2-D2 droid is a must-have for tech-minded fans of the Star Wars series, as well as kids who have a dedicated interest in learning how to code.
pros: Easy to drive R2-D2 around via its companions smartphone app
cons: Only 1 hour of playtime per charge

customer_reviews.title: First I love the sound is INSIDE R2
customer_reviews.text: First I love the sound is INSIDE R2. This is much more realistic for my son's to enjoy. Second, it's amazing engineering with the 3 leg coming out and retracting hopefully it lasts. Why 4 stars? Well first its pricey but assume its the engineering and licensing and of course the patrol mode leaves something to be desired. In a big open space you don't notice it but inside a house, he just ends up stuck against a wall.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Poor design. if anything gets in any of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Poor design. if anything gets in any of the wheels on the bottom, R2-D2 stops working. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Sutch

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not what expected...
customer_reviews.text: The R2D2 is cute and makes great sounds, but is really annoying to try to control. I was hoping to be able to send it off around the house to explore, but haven't been able to get that to work - software app isn't user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Moots

customer_reviews.title: Cats will attack R2
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the holidays for my Jedi girlfriend. Charges quickly and works great on our faux hardware floors. And the range is fairly good using the app. One note, it's best you practice in a smaller space to master controlling the droid. Also, we found that when the phones was distracted by notifications, the app needs to be refreshed. But that maybe with our GS7. But if you have a pet, like a fat who thinks and acts like a tiger, they will attack R2. Our brat cat dislikes the smell of oranges, so we placed some essential oil on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: This droid is fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: Sphero has done a wonderful job of creating this R2D2 droid. It functions extremely well on hard surfaces and very short pile carpet. The detail of the droid itself is exceptional. For those of you you who happen to be having trouble with the Watch Me Feature, be sure to have the microphone enabled in the Droids by Sphero app in your settings. It works great!!
customer_reviews.author: DMB63

customer_reviews.title: Fun easy to control
customer_reviews.text: I got this toy on a whim, I have the BB8 one already. I love that the app lets you connect multiple droids (we had a fun viewing session watching episode 7 and both droids connected well and interacted with the movie). This droid is also much easier to drive than BB8, not a huge surprise, but it will make it easier for my nephew to play with it. As mentioned by another reviewer, patrol mode doesn't work well, but other than that I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: V. Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: will not "drive", will not "patrol", will not ...
customer_reviews.text: will not "drive", will not "patrol", will not move into tripod position. charged for 12+ hours, no change. deleted and redownloaded the app several times, no change. very disappointing for a 10 year old's birthday present, to get a noisy, light-up paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: patrick

customer_reviews.title: Cool RC Toys for the kids and adults!
customer_reviews.text: I got R2-D2 as described with great shipping! So it took me a bit to get the app. After researching I found the correct app online. The app is called Sphero star wars droids. There you can see all of the star wars droids from the movies. R2 does all of the emotes you see on screen. Over all this is a newer way to play with RC toys! The kids love it! I also got them a BB8 to run with R2. Its cool having droids in the house making all those noises while running around. Works great on hardwood floors. Carpet its 50/50 with R2 but with BB8 works fine! Great and wonderful RC toys!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great detail and very fun
customer_reviews.text: Everything is exceptionally detailed. It'd be best to think of him as a highly interactive remote control toy than a droid, though. The roaming mode is very cool, but R2 gets caught on bookshelves and in tight corners fairly often. The battery life is really good. I've lost interest before I've actually run out of battery. There's also an interactive charging mode where R2 will interact when he senses your proximity while he's charging. I would note that the feet are just little rubber tracks, so you're basically limited to smooth floors or low pile carpet. Driving him on unfinished concrete is definitely NOT recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Matt G.

customer_reviews.title: Fun! Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this as a fun way for he and my daughter to connect. They enjoy playing with the mini-droid immensely. The attention to detail is remarkable. I must admit that I find our little R2-D2 rolling around on my kitchen floor to be quite amusing. My daughter enjoys making R2 ‘faint’ as well as using the hologram mode that brings the viewer inside the Millennium Falcon. This particular purchase has brought hours of amusement not only to my family but to visiting nieces and nephews. It’s a hit! I think it a good purchase and value. If you’re a Star Wars fan you will be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: rana11

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for Star Wars Fan, esp R2-D2 Fans!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful gift for Star Wars fan. Husband LOVES it and he is very picky. Was waiting for the price to finally drop under $100. It finally did! :D Wouldn't pay more than $100. Cute and interactive. Get the Force band for additional fun. Currently (more like a couple of weeks ago), our local Costco is selling the BB-8 for about $60 (sorry nor recalling the amount and too lazy to look it up).
customer_reviews.author: Practical

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This by far one of the best gifts ever. It was to much when they first came out but now I can get one lol. R2 runs around the house on his own. I don't like to control him,I just let him do him. There are games and he can even watch the starwars movies with us and react. 10 out of 10 If you love the franchise you need them all
customer_reviews.author: craig givens

customer_reviews.title: Third leg issue
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 14 year old grandson who is a huge Star Wars fan. He got it for Christmas opened and played with it the next day. On New Year’s Day it started not working. The video shows what happens with the third leg. Contacted SPHero and received a email reply with a bunch of questions . Answered all questions and included the video as asked. But since no reply. Will continue to get a suitable answer.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Ripperger

customer_reviews.title: Fun for family. Not for doggos.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my husband. When I asked him what he'd rate it, he said "Four Stars" because "It'd be cool if it had a camera." I think it's really cute. It charges with USB and is pretty easy to control with the app. Aside from basic forward/backward controls, R2 has several different animations & reactions he can do. He also beeps when he's done charging and reacts when you pick him up, which is a really nice touch. The only member in our family who isn't a fan, is our Boston Terrier, who barked at him and tried to bite him (without actually touching him somehow.)
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great Device and Warranty Service Too
customer_reviews.text: For a child who is into Star Wars, this is a great toy. The App that comes with it is well produced. After about a month of use, an issue developed where the unit kept falling over (third leg would not extend). I contact customer service to have the unit fixed and they eventually replaced the unit. Though it took a few days for customer service to respond and a while to respond to the to their questions and hear back from them, they did eventually resolve my issue. This toy is not appropriate for very young children unless under direct adult supervision (they need a cell phone to run the App.
customer_reviews.author: JRH

customer_reviews.title: Flippin' Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: Umm... I'm 34 and I bought this for my 6 year old son. I ahhh..... love this little guy. Perhaps a dream fulfilled as I have been geeking out to Starwars since birth, but this little droid is neat. We got the case and the force watch. To be fair the robot is pretty cool, it will even interact with people while it charges on a shelf. Its kinda like having a bird. It whistles and beeps when you walk by. Truly interesting if you live alone. I found myself staring at it and enjoying it more than my son's do. It may be more of an adult toy in the strictest sense of the term.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Smith

customer_reviews.title: A little Star Wars in your house.
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting the little R2D2 App-Enabled Droid, when it went on sale, I picked it up. It doesn't take long for it to charge. I am still trying to learn how to operate him. He does have a habit of falling down and not being able to get back up. My kitten loves attacking him. I am happy with him, but I think I would enjoy him more once I master him better.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa N Bellflower

customer_reviews.title: FUN FUN FUN
customer_reviews.text: Whats not to love about R2D2! This little guy makes R2 sounds and little expressions, just like R2 in the movies. The app was easy to install on my ipad, connection worked perfectly and the unit responds well. I have not experienced any disconnect issues. I am an adult and bought this for me and I am having a great time walking up and down the halls at work. Its my way of getting my daily steps in. p.s. It arrived well packaged and exactly when it was expected.
customer_reviews.author: LuvGr8Gizmos

customer_reviews.title: Defect?
customer_reviews.text: I've seen many video's on this product, so I was sold and purchased one recently. In the video's, R2-D2 appears to glide smoothly when in motion and even on carpet. I have hard floor and flat, and when I move the droid forward, it seems to shake (jerk right/left) no matter what speed it's traveling rather than move in a smooth glide. I'm wondering if others have seen this? If the manufacture is reading this review, perhaps you can reply and let me know. With the exception of the shaky motion, everything else seems great about it. I can only rate this 3 stars due to my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: BattleP

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. No instructions. No on line help that I could find.
customer_reviews.author: George D Kerle

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected for the price, but my son is a huge Star Wars enthusiast. Has been ever since my husband and I stood in line with him and his sister for hours waiting to see the first showing of Star Wars, when they were really too young to understand it. Now my little grand daughter can stand in line with him...and I'm sure she will be just as crazy about this seemingly never ending series of sequels as we all have been. Anyway, he loves this thing!
customer_reviews.author: RJR

customer_reviews.title: ARETOO is 2 Cool!
customer_reviews.text: It's actually pretty great. The only issue is that it sometimes turns on for no apparent reason. Otherwise it would be 5 stars. The dog is fascinated by it, but keeps his distance while watching it and moving around with it. Unfortunately it has fallen off the credenza onto the carpet several times. Mostly due to the random activations. But it hasn't taken any damage. That surprised me. R2 is well built and I am quite happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Audentes

customer_reviews.title: This IS the Droid You're Looking For!
customer_reviews.text: My wife had BB8 already and because she finds it wonderful, figured R2 would make an excellent companion. The new app allows for switching between the two and we have plans to run them each from our phones sometime soon. He's got a rubber tank-like tread system on the bottom and fairly well balanced, but didn't do so well on our carpet and toppled over. She cracked up with the head turning and sounds it made. Excellent details, controls, and sound. Well done Sphero, really nailed this toy for hardcore Star Wars fans.
customer_reviews.author: saint4God

customer_reviews.title: Returned - doesn’t work properly
customer_reviews.text: The same issue. On the second day after we unbox R2-D2 it stopped retracting the third leg. I reinstall the app, I tried everything Sphero support recommended to do but couldn't solve the issue
customer_reviews.author: Elena Gorodazheva

customer_reviews.title: Very fun! Find the little promo video it'll sell you.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say I saw the little promo film for this guy (R-2) and thought about it for months. Finally I took the plunge and got one. The only frustrating thing was that the instructions did not provide a site to go to to control him. Luckily I thought about Google Play and there it was for free! I was so impressed that I actually got another one as a gift. Now I just have to figure out how to get back on my wife's good side because she threw me out as I'm too old to play with toys!
customer_reviews.author: Starfleet Dad

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't adore R2?
customer_reviews.text: When I waited hours outside in a line to see the original Star Wars in 1977, I had no idea that I would return time after time with sisters, wife, children, friends and now grandchildren to see these phenomenal films in the franchise. From the big screen to BetaMax to DVD, I have had them all. And the one character who out performs them all is R2, so when I saw this I had to have it. Fun to play with and to drive my dogs crazy but most of all just to see the little guy sitting on a shelf in my office brings me great joy.
customer_reviews.author: John in Dallas

customer_reviews.title: They sent me the wrong thing. But I'm kinda okay with that.
customer_reviews.text: Cute as he is (like either Southpark characters Stan or Kyle) a Spiderman Sphero isn't an R2-D2 Sphero. And as funny as Spidey is, my Sphero BB-8 really has a hard time getting his jokes. He needs an R2 unit as well. In reference to the Sphero Spidey - he is awesome. He has a new-rubber basketball texture, adjustable volume, and actually interesting eyes, in all their monochrome LCD mystery. Now if Sphero could make one that web-slings as well as their BB-8 and (reportedly - but not personally verified) Artoo mimick the original, I'd pay double.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My son (3.5 years old) love it. He asked to play with it every day. The first one we received stopped working the next day and one of the treads was torn. The one that replaced it has been going strong since we took it out of the box. Looking forward to watching one of the Star Wars movies with it. We also have the BB-8 one, I do not like it as much as it does not have a speaker - the sound only comes from the phone or table you are using.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: It's R2-D2!! WHAT MORE DO YOU NEED?
customer_reviews.text: Very highly recommended for any Star Wars geek. The app works very well and the tricks are mesmerizing. Looks and behaves exactly like the on-screen character and I have absolutely no complaints. However, I would not suggest using this on a carpet. The roller belts on the bottom are made of rubber and they collect a lot of dust. It works absolutely perfectly on glass, hardwood, your work desk (sunmica) or any other flat surface.
customer_reviews.author: Akshay

customer_reviews.title: So Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I wish things like this existed when I was a kid. I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my youngest son who loves Star Wars, & specifically the droids. Well, needless to say I have ended up using just as much as he has. This R2-D2 droid is great. Once connected to the app you can do so much with it & even leave it to patrol on its own. I am definitely getting some others like the BB-8 to sync up with it.
customer_reviews.author: jmcgouldrick

customer_reviews.title: It's R2-D2 phone controllable.
customer_reviews.text: Drives very well; scoots along hardwood floors like a champ and even does some of the dances/motions from the movies and sounds, too! Pressed the button to figure out what each was and laughed so hard I almost cried when it did the "scream" and "Urrr, ruuuuurrrrr, THUNK" and fell over. Worth every penny for that one sfx and action alone in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Rich K

customer_reviews.title: Love!  Love!  This R2 is the best!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh, I LOVE this R2! Of course he’s smaller than the actual R2, but he has every bit the personality. Purchased spontaneously, not really knowing what to expect. We have Spiro and it’s fun, but R2 is absolutely amazing. I would have flipped for a toy like this when I was a kid. I kind of flipped as an adult. We had to watch Star Wars again after buying this toy so we could watch R2 interact. I love this so much! We have a large gap in kids ages, 5 to 26. All of the kids agree this is a winner! Highly recommend to any Star Wars fan!!
customer_reviews.author: A.C.

customer_reviews.title: It's R2-D2 and he seems like he is straight out of the movie
customer_reviews.text: R2-D2 is so much fun. I liked our BB-8 but when I saw that an R2-D2 sphero was available and at a good price, I had to get him as well. I have fun playing with my kids with these robots and it takes me back to my younger self watching the original Star Wars movies. I only wish I had this toy back then! Don't hesitate buying, if you love R2-D2 - this won't disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew R. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Who doesnt love R2???
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!! It is 7" tall and sits on my desk so when I need to have some fun I grab my IPad and wake R2 up to do some preprogrammed actions from the movie. Works great, very detailed, I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jdlockwood

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GIFT!!! VERY WELL DONE
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made droid. I bought this for my 5 year old as a gift. He absolutely loves it! The controls are very easy to handle on a tablet, even for a 5 year old. The Droid makes tons of sounds and movements and almost has a personality. Moves great on hardwood floors, carpeting is a bit slower but still works. Lots of fun for him. I will probably look into the BB8 next for him. I can easily see this as a gift for a Starwars fan of any age, adults included.
customer_reviews.author: John W

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun little droid
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. I got the BB-8 Sphero from my Girlfriend and had so much fun with it that I wanted a second Droid for them to interact together (a feature in the software). it had to be R2. I love this R2 just as much, not only is he super detailed, but he has his own speaker and makes all the authentic Beeps and Boops I remember from the movie, Even the one that results in his falling down (which this does to my delight!). It's great!
customer_reviews.author: Gritchu

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining and fun!
customer_reviews.text: The R2 Droid is easy to set up and fun. For its price point, it delivers. The sounds are spot on and combined with motion it brings R2 to life. Manage your expectations, this is not an all terrain vehicle with shocks and big tires. We have hardwood floors so it's not a problem. It won't go over an area rug or move over a room transition bump; but that is not a problem. It's a fun toy, now we need BB 8 to keep him company.
customer_reviews.author: Jay G.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but QC can be better
customer_reviews.text: The R2 is super cute but the production quality is a little lacking. I requested for an exchange cos the first one had an inner decal that was improperly affixed (resulting in a ‘light leak’). Most unfortunately, the replacement unit was shaky in its movements (the first one was super smooth but I had already returned it). Oh well...
customer_reviews.author: crazycat

customer_reviews.title: Fun R2-D2 Robot
customer_reviews.text: This droid R2-D2 is really fun. You control him with your cell phone. Great sounds and movement. Just like having your own miniature R2-D2. He stands about 7 inches tall. Moves about on both 2 and 3 "legs". Easy to learn how to control. Charges quickly. Very happy with this purchase. Would make a great gift if you have a Star Wars fan.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce B.

customer_reviews.title: Has trouble on shag carpet
customer_reviews.text: What i love is the interaction. When u leave him plugged in he randomly interacts with the room! Very cool design down to the smallest detail. It was just a little disapointing to see how much trouble he has running on carpet but still so cool! Hasbro also has an interactive r2 unit that i will be checking into next, but this is a must for any collector.
customer_reviews.author: Demetrius

customer_reviews.title: Great gift! Operates from your cell phone.
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolutely best gift for a Star Wars fan!! It was so beyond my expectations!! I got it as a gift for my 27 year old. Everyone went crazy over it. It does so many cute things. You have to get one. It is so authentic looking and sounding. Everything works great. It is programmed from your cell phone. We ran it off of a android Samsung phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He lights up, dances and drives the dog crazy, WE LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: R2-D2 lights up, dances and drives the dog crazy wanting to play with it, WE LOVE IT! Unlike our original BB-8 sphero (droids which we love both the battle worn and regular BB-8) this R2 unit lights up dances and it very fun! He is easy to control and turns on a dime, but just like the other sphero droids carpet would be a challenge; he is a hardwood/laminate droid only.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie B.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: This unit was preferred by my kids to the to the bb9 Droid of the same make. R2 is just timeless. He is very realistic! My boys are 7 and 9. They got bored with it after 3 or 4 uses though. Back to tablets! Ugggggg!!!!
customer_reviews.author: S B

customer_reviews.title: A piece of crap that broke down in two minutes...
customer_reviews.text: A piece of crap. After complete charging it worked for two minutes until its feet locked in alternate position (angry feature) and now they do not realign, nor the droid extends its central leg anymore. I will return it asap.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo Desotti

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun but was a pain to set up
customer_reviews.text: Updating the firmware kept making my phone crash and turn off, which is why I subtracted a star. The app is also very annoying in always playing the theme. Don't get me wrong, I always loved the music, but it's tiresome when all you want to do is get R2 running around. Once I got it set up, though, wow, is this a lot of fun. This is something that turns an adult into a kid again, making you say, "Where was something like this when I was growing up?"
customer_reviews.author: PE

customer_reviews.title: the support ticket went like this: - Hey
customer_reviews.text: The app feels incomplete, but the one star is due to support. After a month or so, one of the legs stopped working. So, the support ticket went like this: - Hey, droid is broken - Naaa, we don't believe you - Look, here is a video of it not working - (2 days later) wow, it isn't working That's it, I haven;t heard back from them ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar León Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Impressive!!! My son can’t stop playing with it. There were some challenges with the app at first (on Android, not on iOS), but everything as expected and more. Btw, we could make the force band work with this droid!!! I was concerned because the armband says BB8 only, but it does work with this one too! ;) I’m so glad we bought this one for my son Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.author: RoBin

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to give you a good review because I ordered a very short time (days ...
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I wanted to give you a good review because I ordered a very short time (days I think) before Christmas, and it came in time to give to my son. Thanks for that. I am sorry that I can't give a review as to how well it worked because it was stolen from my car. We were over at my mom Christmas evening, and It was in the car charging in order to bring home to use, and someone took it. I will say that I am positive that it worked perfectly fine, and I would absolutely order from you again. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: GoldenVeronica

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: I got a Sphero BB8 before getting the R2D2 and I was really happy with my purchase, but the BB8 is a little unstable and lacks personality. When I saw the R2D2 reviews and the prices of a black Friday couldn't help it and it was soooo worth it. The R2D2 is by far better than the BB8 (on my perspective). The preset responses make him so likable and give him a lot of personality. My wife loved it and I definitely recommend it as a gift or an addition to your personal collection, that by the way, fits perfectly with a sixth scale figure.
customer_reviews.author: Juan R.

customer_reviews.title: As delightful or complicated as you want
customer_reviews.text: This is certainly the best value R2-D2 money can buy. Not only is it a beautiful replica that is well made, it is fun to animate and drive. And when that gets boring, you can program it yourself with easy drag and drop programming or JavaScript! What more could you possibly want out of a robot?
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves Stars Wars and has been looking at this product for sometime. So I went ahead and ordered it for Christmas for him. He loves it as do our kids so easy to use and fun too
customer_reviews.author: D. McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Best Droid Ever
customer_reviews.text: I got to play with R2 prototypes from Kenner when I was a kid at 10-11, as my neighbor worked for Kenner. So I have seen a lot over the years. This is the best R2 ever. Not too big or small. Every move and sound is just as you would see it in the movies; albeit a bit faster in some cases. I am really impressed with the attention to detail with regard to the lighting and/or changing shades of some of the color LEDs. Everything was really well thought out. The people who developed this deserve a pat on the back and a box of really, really good doughnuts.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E.

customer_reviews.title: Takes you back in time!
customer_reviews.text: R2D2 this product by Shpero is detailed in so many ways that it takes you back to 1977 when you dreamed of a Robot that would go on adventures with you. You just got to see him in action to believe it! You can find a full review of Sphero R2D2 APP enabled Droid on my YouTube channel Hunsakers Home Hacks we take a detailed look at all the detail of R2D2 go check it out.
customer_reviews.author: Hunsakers Home Hacks

customer_reviews.title: Truly great toy!
customer_reviews.text: We got all three of the Sphero droids and they’re all great fun. This little guy is just the cutest though. He has just as much character as in the movie. Everyone loves him, kids and adults. The app is easy to use and works way better than other Bluetooth toys we’ve tried. I am also excited about the fact it can be used to teach kids coding through the Sphero education app. This is a truly great toy!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It completely surprised me how worth this it really is. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: No issues, beautiful controls, options, the noises coming from the R2D2. Favorite thing I've bought for under $50 that was a really happy buy. Get one guys especially if you have kids who are fans, adult or children haha. It's a very great piece of technology and pretty accurate for its size and price. 9/10
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great just a little fragile
customer_reviews.text: Its a big step up in performance from old BB-8. The only thing you have to be careful with is its durability. My BB-8 has literally gone down flights of stairs, been kicked, thrown, and even been in the pool (he's a tank). R2-D2 wouldn't last 5 seconds through any of this, so just be aware of that limitation.
customer_reviews.author: B. Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun little droid
customer_reviews.text: I just learned about this droid recently and picked this up. It's a cute and fun little droid. I like when it connects to bluetooth and the middle leg pops out. You can steer the droid and do all sorts of things with it. I haven't tried out all the features but it appears to be a cool toy.
customer_reviews.author: MagicBill

customer_reviews.title: R2-D2 is the BEST! Even bought two!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a huge Star Wars fan! Growing up as a kid (26 now) I always had some pretty sweet Star Wars toys. I can’t say enough how FREAKING awesome R2 is! My girlfriend who really doesn’t care for it but watches them all with. Was blown away too! For the price! This is a MUST for a Star Wars! You won’t regret it! I also ordered a BB-9E! The BB droid is cool and fun but R2 steals the prize by a mile! He does so much! I loved it so much, I even ordered another R2 to put away and keep in the box! YOU WONT BE LET DOWN! May the force be with ya! Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Topher C

customer_reviews.title: Poor product support from Sphero
customer_reviews.text: When it worked, it was amazing. Great sound effects and animations, and the phone app was easy to use. Unfortunately, just over a month after I purchased it, the right tread stopped working. The return time period of 1 month had already expired, so I reached out to Sphero to see if there were any options for me to either troubleshoot or seek repairs, but they have never gotten back to me.
customer_reviews.author: James C. Bourgeois

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for his birthday and he's been having a blast playing with it and having it follow people around at work! He asked how much it was because it is such great quality and was shocked by how affordable it was!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: This toy is the coolest! I want really sure what we were getting when we bought it; but when you download the app, you are able to drive R2D2 around using your phone, or there are preset buttons that make him perform an action. There's also a mode where you can draw lines on your phone screen and R2D2 will follow the path. The 'hologram' mode isn't quite what I thought it would be (it's basically just looking at the ship on your phone screen while you move it around, like a 360 picture). Overall, it's a very fun toy and we all love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you like Sphero's BB-8 you'll like R2D2 just as much
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 5 year old son who already had the BB-8 version, and he loves it. He loves both of them. He's a robot fanatic and loves star wars as well. It's a little advanced for him at 5, but with a little help from me he does great. If your a fan of robots and star wars, you'll have fun with these. I enjoy them myself at 39 :)
customer_reviews.author: joseph

customer_reviews.title: great robot
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought with her allowance.First we were confused about how to charge it but we soon found out that we only have to use the computer and app. Very good robot that my daughter likes going on adventures with. If u are a STAR WARS fan u should definitely buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mai kaan

customer_reviews.title: My birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: This is so cool and very controllable. It is fun to hook it up and have it respond to the Star Wars movies when my kids are not being noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Moshell

customer_reviews.title: cute and fun, but not recomended for cats.
customer_reviews.text: lack of instructions included with the product is why this is not 5 stars. Once instructions were found online the toy turned on and was able to be played with. R2-D2 is VERY detailed and great quality. there is a bit of a learning curve and the app has its issues, but overall I'm very pleased with this Droid.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Best droid ever!
customer_reviews.text: This R2-D2 droid feels and acts like the real thing. I legit thought this was the exact copy of R2-D2 from star wars. Sphero really outdid themselves with these droids. There are so many options to control them. Apparently you could even watch the star wars movies with them and they'll react according to the movie. Really great!!
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Best Star Wars Toy Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is quite possibly the most amazing Star Wars toy I have ever owned. I keep it plugged into my desktop PC via USB so it will make random R2 sounds all the time. The mobile app is easy to use and has some seriously good features. Well worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was disappointment !  : (
customer_reviews.text: It did not meet our expectations! It needed to be able to do more, than the simple movement. It was rather disappointing and a waste of money. It is definitely not worth the amount of money we paid for it. BB
customer_reviews.author: Barbara BuschAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and it was such a great hit that I bought the rest of the droids. R2D2 is so cute and interactive. I highly recommend these for any star wars fan you might know
customer_reviews.author: K Y H

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Wheels pick up hair and can't be removed to clean. So it's a matter of an hour or two before the droid is useless. Sphero's customer service around this issue is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Jason F

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: No words can describe how awesome this R2 unit is! I feel like making him a socket on the back of my car and blowing up the Death Star!! So realistic and detailed. I love how it interacts with the Sphero BB-8. Great product for any Star Wars nerd out there! A must have!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. James J. Olschlager Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Droid
customer_reviews.text: The R2-D2 is spot on. It works well. The only issue I had was leaving it in human interactive mode. At some point the middle leg glitches and makes a grinding noise jutting in and out. Spiro made me jump thru hoops and then sent me away even after I showed a video of the issue. Just sleep the droid and that seems to do the trick...no mode human interactive mode. :-(
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: No display the QR code for mobile application on the product box, you need to search for it self.
customer_reviews.text: The R2D2 is so good, although there are some scratches, but did not affect the appearance and operation, I very like this R2D2. In addition, no display the QR code for mobile application on the product box, you need to search for it self. I need used of some time to search the App, so that it lacks some considerate.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Kwok

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 5 minutes, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after 5 minutes of use (fully charged) set to roam. Contacted Sphero support and followed all steps to resolve the issue. I spent over an hour of trouble shooting and nothing worked. Poor quality and QA. I expected better.
customer_reviews.author: Mirek

customer_reviews.title: Star Wars adventure
customer_reviews.text: Now BB-8 and R2-D2 can have adventures with the cat and patrol the house. Got this as a gift for my wife and she and my son love it. Hours of fun. A must for Star Wars fans.
customer_reviews.author: Displaced jersey boy

customer_reviews.title: Problems with the battery
customer_reviews.text: This is the second R2D2 that has problems with the batteries. What a disappointment! I exchanged 25 emails with Spero the manufacturer in order to help me and they suggested to return it!
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Excuse me, but this R2-D2 is in prime condition, a real bargain.
customer_reviews.text: I originally seen the Sphero R2 last year while shopping and just by appearances was impressed. After reading what it was capable of doing explained on the packaging, it really piqued my interest. Price was too steep for me at the time so off I went. Seeing it on sale here..I couldn't resist. I only tinkered with it for about 10 minutes and really enjoyed it! In time, I am sure I will handle the maneuvering like a pro. Should you be sitting on the fence about buying this...sit no longer! I am very pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the droid you’re looking for
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound, lights, movement, features and detailing. When not playing with it, this R2 displays wonderfully alongside my high grade statues. So impressed with everything about this! I like how the sounds come from the actual unit and not the app like Sphero’s BB-9E.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A Bohlmann

customer_reviews.title: Great toy if it would stay upright
customer_reviews.text: Even idle R2 will beep and fall over. 2/3rd of the emotes cause R2 to just fall over. Now I know why Sphero is going out of business.
customer_reviews.author: Grumbleback

customer_reviews.title: This thing rocks!
customer_reviews.text: I am a kid reborn. OMG if this were available in 1977 when Star Wars came out it would have been even more awesome. The movement, the third wheel popping in and out, the sounds, the animations! They are all great! I bought two, one for my granddaughter and one for me :-) I am sure kids and adults will love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Brown

customer_reviews.title: Easy to learn controls
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to understand the controls. The robot is very well detailed and realistic looking in my opinion. The app is cool. But I just wish the controls weren’t so sensitive
customer_reviews.author: John Turcsik

customer_reviews.title: Nice try
customer_reviews.text: I want to love it cause it's r2 but you can't have it be autonomous with out been connected to the phone and plug in all the time :/ but it's still kind of kool
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love my R2D2!!! Great for any age. Everyone I show him, people are amazed in how well he is built. Built to last. Highly recommend for any Star Wars junkie
customer_reviews.author: Jim Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Test it when you get it
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my collection, but still working with Sphero on getting a working droid. Their customer service is not very fast, but it still looks great next to my other droids! I only recommend that you test it Before you give this as a gift, just in case you need to send it in for a replacement with Sphero.
customer_reviews.author: David Garcia

customer_reviews.title: What a fun realistic item!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my 25 year old daughter. Thinking that is was a normal little fun present. Needless to say my grown daughter played it with this R2D2 like a school child. Really a great item!
customer_reviews.author: keith daley

customer_reviews.title: Does not work out of box!
customer_reviews.text: Does not work out of the box. My phone does not recognize it. I have a sphero and my phone recognizes that perfectly. I tried charging as recommended but still no change. I purchased this on sale and would like a replacement. Hopefully I can then change this to a better review.
customer_reviews.author: Jen L

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for son (10) Christmas gift; easy, user-friendly app and most entertaining for the family. R2-D2 sounds and lights up. Hubby is often found playing with it when son is not home. Big Hit!
customer_reviews.author: pfloyd777

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased R2-D2 app enabled Droid for my 11 year old daughter. She absolutely loves it. She’s taken it to school to share with her science teacher and classmates. There is no separate remote control. He can be controlled via an app. My daughter uses her iPad to control it. It’s smaller than we expected, but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: shay mcclinton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little robot
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for Christmas. He loves it. R2D2 is by far the cutest little thing ever. He does little tricks and roams around the house. This is a fun little toy to have.
customer_reviews.author: Staci Roth

customer_reviews.title: Seems off balance and tuos over easily...defective?
customer_reviews.text: Love it but, my droid seems to be off balance and leaning forward, And sometimes tips over when it shouldn't be tipping over. I'll give it a bit longer but may return it as defective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Droid is Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! The build quality is amazing; it's nice and heavy, sturdy and detailed, almost as much as a Sideshow statue, etc. I've tested it on hardwood floors and on the (relatively thin) carpet at work, and he zips along just fine on both. The sound effects are straight up movie accurate, and he's got a ton of different pre-canned actions/reactions, even the classic "oh damn I just got blasted" fall over effect. :-) Best part of all: the kid loves it and the dog is freaked out by it. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Meltown

customer_reviews.title: A must have for any true Star Wars fan!
customer_reviews.text: I could not stop smiling once I received this droid. The detail and over performance of it was fantastic. It has a built in speaker which I did not know about which makes his sounds and really makes him come to life.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lynch

customer_reviews.title: So I’ve had a Sphero R2-D2 for a while now ...
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve had a Sphero R2-D2 for a while now and I’ve had it mostly on my storage case just to sit there and I’ve noticed recently that once I took it off there it got melted plastic in the gears and is no longer working now I also hear crackling noises and it does not charge properly so I had to order a complete new one But overall I love it
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for someone who collects Star Wars. I am not that avid of a fan but this was so cute that I wanted one. It makes for a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: Can't Get Enough!!
customer_reviews.text: This is better then expected!! Easy app to download, easy to learn and a ton of fun. Very realistic and looking to buy the other droids so they can all communicate.
customer_reviews.author: CD71799

customer_reviews.title: A Geek’s dream
customer_reviews.text: My wife has told me that a grown man looks silly playing with this awesome bot. Forget her. I feel like a real member of the rebel alliance. I only wish It projected a hologram of Leia to keep me company in the doghouse.
customer_reviews.author: Jdaddy

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas Gift EVER
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. One for my sister's boyfriend and his kids. One for my father and nephew. They all love them and think its the coolest little thing ever! The dog will hate it though and try to murder R2D2
customer_reviews.author: Megs

customer_reviews.title: Fun Toy
customer_reviews.text: I liked this bot, but it's not the greatest on anything other than a level floor with no textures, carpet, rugs, etc. Not great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Tolicated

customer_reviews.title: R-2 in the "flesh"
customer_reviews.text: Oh man, this is the best thing ever. Just be careful not to restrict r2's movement when the motors are moving his limbs and feet, it will screw him up badly. Also, watch out for hair in the tracks, it is really hard to get it out. Otherwise this is the best thing ever for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Darth Hoek

customer_reviews.title: So much fun until
customer_reviews.text: I love this little droid. I would give it 5 stars but my cat learned how to knock it over, rendering it helpless. Also, where is the little arm that comes out and shocks things? I demand they upgrade this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Techtesting

product_meta.title: R2-D2 App-Enabled Droid
product_meta.description: R2-D2 is an astromech droid from a galaxy far, far away.... Control your droid with your smart device or keep R2-D2 in top shape with augmented reality training. R2-D2’s signature front and rear LED lights are fully functional, and an integrated speaker means the beeps and boops come right from R2-D2 itself. Watch R2-D2 interact with other Star Wars App-enabled Droids by Sphero, and view films from the Star Wars saga with R2-D2 reacting by your side. This iconic droid has been brought to life like never before.
feature_bullets: Authentic Movement - Drive R2-D2 with your device, go from bipod to tripod stances, or trigger emotive waddles
Integrated Speaker & LEDs - Sounds come right from R2-D2, and front and rear lights are fully functional.
Code R2-D2 - Download the Sphero Edu app and use character-specific commands to program R2-D2 and complete STEM activities.
Watch With Me - View films from the Star Wars saga with R2-D2 reacting by your side.
Holographic Simulation - Explore the Star Wars galaxy, roam iconic ship interiors, and more.Bluetooth range:30 m

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,102 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
